title: WATCH || Highlights of Kentucky's 2017 recruiting class
text:
WATCH || Highlights of Kentucky's 2017 recruiting class Watch highlights featuring all six members of Kentucky's 2017 recruiting class via Courtside Films. Slot to Kentucky Links 
For the seventh time in the last nine years, Kentucky coach John Calipari has inked the nation's No. 1 recruiting class. 
The Wildcats' 2017 class includes six of the top 36 prospects in they country, five 5-stars and four McDonald's All-Americans in Hamidou Diallo , P.J. Washington , Nick Richards , Quade Green , Jarred Vanderbilt and Shai Gilgeous-Alexander . 
Watch highlights of all six in this mixtape via Courtside Films. 
Get the latest UK news sent straight to your inbox with out EMAIL NEWSLETTER Author
